title: I Scrolled Through 1187 Sweaters From Topshop, H&M, and Mango—I'd Buy These 32
text:
If you find yourself saying things like "sweater weather" and tagging all your friends in this viral SNL clip, well, fam, you've come to the right place. The beloved season has officially arrived, so bust out all your fall and winter knits and repeat "sweater weather" over and over until the snow melts. Sure, you probably have a stack of sweaters to choose from in your cold-weather arsenal, but there's no time like the present to stock up on a few more. Spring is still a long way off… just saying.

But just because you're in the market for a new knit doesn't mean you want to spend the time scrolling through retailer after retailer just to find one. That's where we come in. We've scoured the World Wide Web from top to bottom (okay, really from our top three affordable sites) and found 32 cute cheap sweaters that are worthy of buying immediately. From the cute cardis on offer at Mango to the statement-making knits at Topshop and the best classic styles from H&M, keep scrolling to shop the ultimate sweater edit.

H&M

View photos

H&M Rib-Knit Wool-Blend Sweater ($60)

Wear this and let the compliments roll on in.

View photos

H&M Modal Turtleneck Top ($10)

For $10, you need this top in all four prints.
